activities: Kiersted Systems, L.P. delivers a full spectrum of E-Discovery services including collections, analysis, processing, review and production of electronic information.  Kiersted Systems, L.P. operates from a single high security facility with several layers of both physical and network security protocols in place.

recoursemech: Kiersted Systems, L.P. agrees to mediation and binding arbitration, if necessary, by the American Arbitration Association (AAA).
